name: Unicode & Zawgyi Combobox
author: Saturngod

sections.description: Description: Combobox for convert between unicode and zawgyi. javascript is written by solvewaresolution. If you add this plugin, combobox will show and user can change zawgyi or unicode 5.1 to see your website or blog.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload downloaded folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. WP Admin -> Settings -> Unicode & Zawgyi Combobox
